text:
in relation to consumers and/or end-users.
34. The undertaking shall disclose whether and how it takes action to avoid causing or contributing
to material negative impacts on consumers and/or end-users through its own practices,
including, where relevant, in relation to marketing, sales and data use. This may include
disclosing what approach is taken when tensions arise between the prevention or mitigation of
material negative impacts and other business pressures.
